prompts: Create a majestic ice-type bird Pokemon with striking blue feathers and a regal demeanor.
Imagine an elegant Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter with frosty wings and a shimmering tail.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that soars through the mountains, cloaked in icy blue and white hues.
Design a mythical creature that represents the cold, featuring long, flowing wings and a serene expression.
Generate a Pokemon that blends beauty and power, showcasing a graceful flying style with ice-themed abilities.
Make a stunning ice-type Pokemon that captures the essence of winter landscapes and glacial beauty.
Give me a legendary bird Pokemon that glides effortlessly through snowy terrains, radiating an aura of calm.
